column3: Latest;Kampong Speu:------ A 59 year old mango orchard keeper in Treng Trayeng commune
column5: has been arrested after slicing a cow’s legs.------The bovine had entered the suspect’s mango plantations and destroyed many of his crop. Negligent cow owners often let their beats wander without care
column6: which causes a problem for those growing fruit.------The mango farmer was sent to the provincial court to find a legal solution
column7: although it does appear the cow owner does not wish to press charges. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/407451
